headline.main: Nigeria to Close Airport in Abuja, the Capital, for Repairs
headline.print_headline: Nigeria to Close Airport in Abuja, the Capital, for Repairs

lead_paragraph: Nigeria on Monday announced the imminent closure of the international airport at Abuja, the capital, for six weeks to repair the runway.
snippet: Nigeria on Monday announced the imminent closure of the international airport at Abuja, the capital, for six weeks to repair the runway....
